description: This file defines interfaces related to warning reporting control within the WPEFramework project, including warning event handling and warning reporting unit management.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: Interface for warning event objects, providing methods for serialization, deserialization, categorization, and string conversion.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: Interface for warning reporting units, handling warning event reporting and category management.

classes.name: IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: Nested interface for control over warning reporting categories, extending Core::Messaging::IControl, allowing exclusion and configuration of categories, and cloning.

methods.name: ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Reports a warning event with a specific identifier.

methods.name: FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Fetches information about a specific warning category such as its default status, enabled status, exclusions, and configuration.

methods.name: AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Adds a warning reporting control to the category list.

methods.name: RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Removes a warning reporting control from the category list.

methods.name: Exclude
methods.description: Excludes a specified category from reporting.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configures a category with specific settings.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a copy of the warning reporting control object.
